intro.p: This page will help familiarize you with the Spring IDE plugin. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.

item.b: Setting up a Spring Beans Project
item.p: To configure a project to leverage the Spring IDE, select the menu item "Add Spring Beans Project Nature" from the project's context menu, open the project properties and set the properties on the property "Spring Beans Project".
To learn more you can read the Spring IDE User Guide.
